headline.main: TOUR OF ESTATES TO ASSIST BRITAIN; Annual Trip to Historic Homes in Virginia Will Be Made From April 28 to May 3

lead_paragraph: Several young matrons here, under the leadership of Mrs. John B. Aspegren, are furthering plans for the annual tour of historic Virginia estates to be held from April 28 to May 3 under the auspices of the Garden Club of Virginia for the benefit of Bundles for Britain.
